comment: Expect most of your homework to be reading and working on drafts. Class is mostly discussion of the powerpoints and peer review. It's a reasonable class. Show up to the review meetings. She's very helpful in that. You're going to pass if you show up. She'll give you her Google number if you seem concerned.

Textbook required. Professor isn't too helpful but is understanding. Standard amount of work for an English class. Didn't really cover much material in class, but she gives clear instructions on important assignments. Reasonable class overall.

Sophia tries to make it look like she's helping you, but really isn't. That's probably why I never showed up. You never know what you'll be doing in class ahead of time. To be honest she makes English 1101 harder than it needs to be.

She wasn't the most helpful teacher ever but she tried and she was super sweet. She used to be a high school teacher and luckily she grades like one. Easy A on papers. Most people in the class were slackers and took advantage of it and ended up failing because they didn't ever complete the papers. Great teacher. Don't listen to bad reviews on her.

Professor Russell is the worst English professor I've ever taken. Her grading criteria was not clear and she did not give straight answers when you ask for help. She grades papers by running them through a grammar site and basing it solely on that. She is not helpful and I did not learn anything in the class. Would not recommend.

Her lectures are boring and her voice is very monotone, but she is a very sweet lady. She was really bad with answering questions, but other than that, she was a good professor. She lets you pick your own topics most of the time for papers, which was a big plus.

4 short essays, 2 quizzes, 1 midterm, group work. no final, you do a presentation and write a long paper for the final. You have several weeks to do your papers.  I thought I was getting an A, but I enjoyed the class.

Ms. Russell is good. I had AP and honors classes, and I've become a better writer with her techniques. You will learn, no doubt about that. You just have to pay attention and do your part. She was new this semester and had issues with D2L, but she's very clear. Explains in class and posts to d2l. She even accepts work after the due date.

She is a good teacher and sweet lady. Very helpful! She has one-on-one conferences with students before midterms and final. I was very concerned about the 8 page final, but she read mine and  helped with every aspect of the paper. The conference saved my life.  She doesn't like repeating herself so pay attention and read the instructions/rubric.
No instructions and acts as if she knows everything.  Makes many mistakes but will not own up to them.  Extremely easy though, take the class and just be patient!
She is not clear whatsoever, seems as if she has very little experience.  Gives you multiple assignments at a time with again, no clear instructions. EXTREMELY easy just annoying as can be.
